title: 291-Japanese Folklore: The Monsters
itunes:title: 291-Japanese Folklore: The Monsters
description:
Three stories of monsters from Japan. We have a tanuki, the monsters that lurk in the civilized places, and monsters that might be under your home right now.

The creature is a decapitated man who loves hugs.

--
